socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: mean healthcare cost per patient per year
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Admissions and Cost of Hospitalisation of Phenylketonuria: Spanish Claims Database Analysis

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: annual direct medical cost per patient
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Characteristics, comorbidities, and use of healthcare resources of patients with phenylketonuria: a population-based study

socioeconomic_impact_studies.measure: mean healthcare cost per patient per year
socioeconomic_impact_studies.label: Health economic impact of patients with phenylketonuria (PKU) in France – A nationwide study of health insurance claims data

justification: A peer-reviewed Spanish cost-of-illness study reported mean annual healthcare costs of €4239 per patient (2019), supported by regional Catalonia data (€667/year) and a nationwide French analysis (€11,144/year), providing robust Spain-specific and high-quality evidence.
